summary: Evil is resurrected in a small town threatening to destroy mankind, and the only force that can stop it is a young man wielding a powerful sword.
cast: Brad Dourif|Thomas Ian Nicholas|Mackenzie Rosman|Hallee Hirsh|Julia Whelan|Jessica Morris|Lateef Crowder|Paul McCarthy-Boyington|Ryan Bartley|Elaine Hendrix|Jordan Matthews|Pamela Clay|Cornelius Cox|Diana de Mol|Court Dickert|Daniel Gonzalez|Chris Graue|Stuart Hirsch|Patrick Hughes|Daniel Kennedy|Scott Lilly|Martin R. Mikolajczyk|Tom Portanova|Marla Rea|Taylor Thompson|Mark VanKirk|Michael John Wagner|Harry Zimm|Chris Brewster|Thai Long Ly|Heidi Shepherd|Philip J Silvera
title: Fading of the Cries
